about_the_game:
Welcome to Xenna: The Invasion!

Survive endless waves of monsters and zombies in this fast-paced shooter, where you can play in first-person, third-person, or top-down view. Unlock new weapons, powerful allies, and challenging maps as you fight to reclaim Earth from the nightmare invasion.

💥 Help us improve!
Your feedback is key to making Xenna: The Invasion the best game possible. Share your ideas in our short survey and help shape the future of the game.

💥Includes a stage and a level as a demonstration of the game, as well as a basic tutorial.

🚀 Add it to your wishlist and be the first to receive updates, additional content, and exclusive features.
detailed_description:
Welcome to Xenna: The Invasion!

Survive endless waves of monsters and zombies in this fast-paced shooter, where you can play in first-person, third-person, or top-down view. Unlock new weapons, powerful allies, and challenging maps as you fight to reclaim Earth from the nightmare invasion.

💥 Help us improve!
Your feedback is key to making Xenna: The Invasion the best game possible. Share your ideas in our short survey and help shape the future of the game.

💥Includes a stage and a level as a demonstration of the game, as well as a basic tutorial.

🚀 Add it to your wishlist and be the first to receive updates, additional content, and exclusive features.
name: Xenna: The Invasion Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1660
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Creative Sound Blaster Z

short_description: Face endless hordes of zombies and monsters in this intense shooter, where you can play in first-person, third-person, or top-down view. Unlock new weapons, recruit powerful allies, explore new maps, and take on increasingly challenging enemies.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
